Enigma Ladies Salon

About Us

An upscale destination in Dubai, UAE offering a complete range of services for the purpose of improving health, beauty and relaxation through personal care treatments. From Manicure & Pedicure stations to a full-fledged Nailbar.

Salon & Spa

Unleash your true beauty. Get engaged in a series of pampering treatments that's right for you! Offering complete services from head to toe.

Exclusive Brands

In our salon, we use only the best products! Organic and healthy! We also sell in retail.

Home Service

For events, functions, and for all occasions, just call the emergency beauty hotline.

Services

The place for creative and simultaneously the most elegant nails in Dubai!

If you're in the mood for a color change, a haircut or a funky hairstyle :)

Sexy, clean, & flawless all over! Rest assured for the best waxing treatment!

Skin Treatments! Achieve a lovely body -- book for a weekly treatment and get the proper care your skin deserves!

By our professional make-up artist for a beauty beyond perception.
